section.title: Puppet assert class parameters
section.para: In Puppet modules we construct classes to perform a certain task, for example, configuring a Linux node as an LDAP client. In the class we use class parameters to specify certain values, like the FQDN of the LDAP server. The puppet class must fail to compile if we forget to specify the class parameters. How do we make this work? In this section we define the pattern to assert the class parameters.

We explain how it works by an example. The class parameters are looked up by Puppet in the hiera hierarchy. So, we first give the hiera set of files, from which Puppet can obtain the class parameters:
&t1p; cat /etc/hiera.yaml --- :backends: - yaml :hierarchy: - depzones/%{depzone}/hosts/%{fqdn} - depzones/%{depzone} - base
:yaml: # datadir is empty here, so hiera uses its defaults: # - /var/lib/hiera on *nix # - %CommonAppData%\PuppetLabs\hiera\var on Windows # When specifying a datadir, make sure the directory exists. :datadir: /var/lib/hiera

Note that, since we are on the system ds1.dmsat1.org, the %{fqdn} expands to ds1.dmsat1.org. The %{depzone} key exapands to dmsat1 since we have created a custrom depzone fact with:
&t1p; cat /etc/profile.d/depzone.sh export FACTER_depzone="dmsat1"
We can show both facts on the command line with:
&t1p; facter depzone dmsat1
&t1p; facter fqdn ds1.dmsat1.org

Because the system knows the above facts, the /etc/hiera.yaml is read as:
&t1p; cat /etc/hiera.yaml --- :backends: - yaml :hierarchy: - depzones/dmsat1/hosts/ds1.dmsat1.org - depzones/dmsat1 - base
:yaml: # datadir is empty here, so hiera uses its defaults: # - /var/lib/hiera on *nix # - %CommonAppData%\PuppetLabs\hiera\var on Windows # When specifying a datadir, make sure the directory exists. :datadir: /var/lib/hiera

For testing purposes, we leave the first two YAML files empty, but we put in base.yaml:
&t1p; cat /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: - "a" - "b" validate_params::my_string: "a"

callout.para:
$my_array must be set in the hiera hierarchy. It must meat the following conditions:
The variable $my_array must be of type array.
The array $my_array must have at least one element.
The elements of $my_array must be of type string.
The array $my_array must have at least a value in the first element.

$my_string must be set in the hiera hierarchy. It must meat the following conditions:
The variable $my_string must be of type string.
The string $my_string must contain at least one character.

section.para:
To verify if the pattern works as designed, we conduct a number of tests. The tests are:
No array:
&t1p; cat /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: validate_params::my_string: "a"
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Error: Must pass my_array to Class[Validate_params] in /root/validate_params.pp on node ds1.dmsat1.org Error: Must pass my_array to Class[Validate_params] in /root/validate_params.pp on node ds1.dmsat1.org
$my_array is set to empty string:
&t1p; cat /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: "" validate_params::my_string: "a"
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Error: "" is not an Array. It looks to be a String at /root/validate_params.pp:9 on node ds1.dmsat1.org Error: "" is not an Array. It looks to be a String at /root/validate_params.pp:9 on node ds1.dmsat1.org
Empty array:
&t1p; cat /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: [] validate_params::my_string: "a"
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Error: validate_params::$my_array not set at /root/validate_params.pp:11 on node ds1.dmsat1.org Error: validate_params::$my_array not set at /root/validate_params.pp:11 on node ds1.dmsat1.org
First array element empty:
&t1p; cat my_array /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: - "" validate_params::my_string: "a"
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Error: validate_params::$my_array first element not set at /root/validate_params.pp:14 on node ds1.dmsat1.org Error: validate_params::$my_array first element not set at /root/validate_params.pp:14 on node ds1.dmsat1.org
First array element of wrong type:
&t1p; cat my_array /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: - false validate_params::my_string: "a"
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Error: false is not a string. It looks to be a FalseClass at /root/validate_params.pp:13 on node ds1.dmsat1.org Error: false is not a string. It looks to be a FalseClass at /root/validate_params.pp:13 on node ds1.dmsat1.org
First array element has a value:
&t1p; cat my_array /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: - "a" validate_params::my_string: "a"
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Notice: Compiled catalog for ds1.dmsat1.org in environment production in 0.23 seconds Notice: Finished catalog run in 0.04 seconds
String is not set:
&t1p; cat my_array /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: - "a" validate_params::my_string:
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Error: Must pass my_string to Class[Validate_params] in /root/validate_params.pp on node ds1.dmsat1.org Error: Must pass my_string to Class[Validate_params] in /root/validate_params.pp on node ds1.dmsat1.org
String is boolean false:
&t1p; cat my_array /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: - "a" validate_params::my_string: false
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Error: false is not a string. It looks to be a FalseClass at /root/validate_params.pp:17 on node ds1.dmsat1.org Error: false is not a string. It looks to be a FalseClass at /root/validate_params.pp:17 on node ds1.dmsat1.org
String is empty value:
&t1p; cat my_array /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: - "a" validate_params::my_string: ""
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Error: validate_params::$my_string not set at /root/validate_params.pp:18 on node ds1.dmsat1.org Error: validate_params::$my_string not set at /root/validate_params.pp:18 on node ds1.dmsat1.org
String has value:
&t1p; cat my_array /var/lib/hiera/base.yaml validate_params::my_array: - "a" validate_params::my_string: "a"
&t1p; puppet apply validate_params.pp Notice: Compiled catalog for ds1.dmsat1.org in environment production in 0.23 seconds Notice: Finished catalog run in 0.04 seconds
